## Description {#details}

A set of parameters used to control various transforms performed by the LoopUnroll pass.

Each of the boolean parameters can be set to: true - enabling the transformation. false - disabling the transformation. None - relying on a global default.

There is also OptLevel parameter, which is used for additional loop unroll tuning.

Intended use is to create a default object, modify parameters with additional setters and then pass it to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopunrollpass">LoopUnrollPass</a>.

Definition at line 61 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-h">LoopUnrollPass.h</a>.

### ForgetSCEV {#a27976a17a9771b0dbbf007157226c33d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="const bool llvm::LoopUnrollOptions::ForgetSCEV">
If true, forget all loops when unrolling.

If false, forget top-most loop of the currently processed loops, which removes one entry at a time from the internal <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> records. For large loops, the former is faster.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-h/#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-h">LoopUnrollPass.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### FullUnrollMaxCount {#a307cbe3aacadc70d64a8570be1394229}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; llvm::LoopUnrollOptions::FullUnrollMaxCount</>}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-h/#l00067">67</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-h">LoopUnrollPass.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### OnlyWhenForced {#a1d7f4d26f7d8ccc72d9006b729e6a637}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::LoopUnrollOptions::OnlyWhenForced">
If false, use a cost model to determine whether unrolling of a loop is profitable.

If true, only loops that explicitly request unrolling via metadata are considered. All other loops are skipped.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-h/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-h">LoopUnrollPass.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
